remarks: Cauchy-Schwarz-Bunjakovsky inequality for R^n.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jun-2014.)
statement:
csbrn.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
csbrn.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) $.
csbrn.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. RR ) $.
csbren $p |- ( ph -> ( sum_ k e. A ( B x. C ) ^ 2 ) <_ ( sum_ k e. A ( B ^ 2 ) x. sum_ k e. A ( C ^ 2 ) ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
